content:
注意事項 # INI Student Handbook # 每學期最少得修36(academic) units，最多可修48(academic) + 3(APD) + 12(non-academic) units。 最多可修大學部課程24 units，且需系辦承認。 每學期至少要選一門core course，除非已修完所有的core。 introductory不能在advanced之後再修，否則不被承認。 開學六周內可以退選(drop)，每年有一次使用drop voucher的機會，可以在課程最後一天之前退選而成績單不被記上withdraw字樣。 Waitlist很常見，但基本上SCS的課最後都能被加進去，INI則是一定能加。 選課策略 # 由於我想同時修神課(SCS系統課)以及完成資安學程的Cyber Defense Concentration track，所以先列出所有課程，再進行排列組合。
Cyber Defense Concentration # 至少得修：
14-513: Introduction to Computer Systems (我是用summer mini 15-503抵) Summer 6 units 20 hrs/week elective 14-642: Introduction to Embedded Systems Fall 12 units 20.1 hrs/week system core 14-735: Secure Coding Fall 12 units 11 hrs/week security core 14-740: Fundamentals of Telecommunications Networks Fall/Spring 12 units 12.4 hrs/week networking core 14-741: Introduction to Information Security Fall/Spring 12 units 15.1 hrs/week security core 14-742: Security in Networked Systems Spring 12 units 13.7 hrs/week AoC 14-761: Applied Information Assurance Fall/Spring 12 units 11.2 hrs/week elective 14-817: Cyber Risk Modeling Fall/Spring 12 units 9 hrs/week business & management core 要修的課 # 14-601: INI Academic & Professional Development 1 Fall 3 units 3.8 hrs/week core 14-760 Advanced Real World Data Networks Spring 12 units 12.8 hrs/week AoC 14-819: Introduction to Software Reverse-Engineering Spring 12 units 12.7 hrs/week elective 15-605: Operating System Design and Implementation Fall/Spring 15 units 23.8 hrs/week elective 15-619: Cloud Computing Fall/Spring 15 units 24.7 hrs/week elective 15-640: Distributed Systems Fall/Spring 12 units 15.8 hrs/week AoC/system core 18-732: Secure Software Systems Spring 12 units 12.6 hrs/week special security 18-733: Applied Cryptography Spring 12 units 10.6 hrs/week special security 預期規劃 # Plan A: 有修Cyber Defense Concentration且最後一學期選Area of Concentration # 小統計 # 必修: 75/75 選修: 60/48 AoC: 36/36 Summer 2025 expected workload: 20 hrs/week units: 6 15-503: Introduction to Computer Systems Fall 2025 expected workload: 43.7 hrs/week units: 39 15-640: Distributed Systems 14-741: Introduction to Information Security 14-817: Cyber Risk Modeling 14-601: INI Academic & Professional Development 1 Spring 2026 expected workload: 45.3 hrs/week units: 39 15-619: Cloud Computing 14-819: Introduction to Software Reverse-Engineering 18-733: Applied Cryptography Fall 2026 expected workload: 54.7 hrs/week units: 48 14-642: Introduction to Embedded Systems 14-740: Fundamentals of Telecommunications Networks 14-735: Secure Coding 14-761: Applied Information Assurance Spring 2027 expected workload: 50.3 hrs/week units: 39 15-605: Operating System Design and Implementation 14-742: Security in Networked Systems 14-760 Advanced Real World Data Networks Plan B: 不修Cyber Defense Concentration且最後一學期選Project # 小統計 # 必修: 75/75 選修: 48/48 Project: 36/36 Summer 2025 expected workload: 20 hrs/week units: 6 15-503: Introduction to Computer Systems Fall 2025 expected workload: 43.7 hrs/week units: 39 15-640: Distributed Systems 14-741: Introduction to Information Security 14-817: Cyber Risk Modeling 14-601: INI Academic & Professional Development 1 Spring 2026 expected workload: 50 hrs/week units: 39 15-619: Cloud Computing 14-819: Introduction to Software Reverse-Engineering 18-732: Secure Software Systems OR 18-733: Applied Cryptography Fall 2026 expected workload: 47.2 hrs/week units: 39 15-605: Operating System Design and Implementation 14-735: Secure Coding 14-740: Fundamentals of Telecommunications Networks Spring 2027 expected workload: 50 hrs/week units: 36 Capstone Project
title: Fall 2025 Course Registration

content:
嗨，我是 Patrick 於成功大學資工系 113 級畢業，目前就讀 CMU MSIS (資安)
平常會跟成大 B33F 50μP、Purdue b01lers 大佬們一起打CTF
我特別喜歡密碼學題目，絕對不是因為我只會數學😢(X
目前正在學習滲透測試，還請大家多多指教！>:D
title: 關於我

content: 簽證 # 這是一個相當麻煩的事，但我的巴不是>:D
title: CMU 行前準備

content: Challenge # from random import randint, randbytes from Crypto.Util.number import isPrime from hashlib import sha256 def proof_of_work(): while True: prefix = randbytes(4) print(f"prefix (hex): {prefix.hex()}") ans = bytes.fromhex(input("ans (hex): ").strip()) if int(sha256(prefix + ans).hexdigest(), 16) & (0xFFFFFF << 232) == 0: break proof_of_work() with open("flag.txt", "r") as f: flag = f.read() f = lambda nbits: randint(13, 37).to_bytes(nbits, 'big') while True: leet_prime = int.from_bytes(randbytes(1 + 3 * 3 - 7), 'big') if isPrime(leet_prime, false_positive_prob=133e-7, randfunc=f): break for _ in range(1337): p = int(input("Prime number: ").strip()) if isPrime(p, false_positive_prob=133e-7, randfunc=f): print(f"The power of leet prime >:D: {pow(leet_prime, p-1**337, p)}") else: print(f"Composite number sucks >:(") if int(input("What is my leet prime: ").strip()) == leet_prime: print(f"Flag for the leet: {flag}")
title: Leet Prime 出題
